page.title: 17BMX RACING
page.content: On Saturday I went to Southampton to the Solent Spitfires which is a BMX racing club. I got in free because I got a free ticket with Barcleys bank. It was a nice BMX course because it was big. There was a man called Tim March who is a world famous BMX rider. He and his two friends did a display of freestyle which is another word for stunts. There was a three year old boy called Jamie. In all the races he went in he won. At about half past four we got special lessons on how to do the course well. The man who showed us was called Woppa. In all the races I went in I came fourth, but in the first race I was third and I slipped my pedal and came fourth. After that we all went home.
